alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 8:28AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tippah, northeastern Benton, northwestern Alcorn, southern Hardeman and southwestern McNairy Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 828 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lagrange, or 14 miles southwest of Bolivar, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Hill Pond State Park, Pocahontas, Walnut, Middleton, Grand Junction, Hickory Valley, Saulsbury, Rogers Springs, Chalybeate, Lisbon, Essary Springs, Brownfield, Lone Pine, Cypress, Van Buren and Tiplersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
